content.text:
Forking %iVf96jOqont4I/t1KBsB+j4OdiDmY+59R0kuo/5SJ4o=.sha256

Has there been any discussion on ephemeral pubs? For example, january.example.com, which exists like pop-up shop for a month, but then deletes all content and creates a new feed as february.example.com? It would still serve its purpose to introduce folks that joined during a specific time period, but would avoid the problem where you join a pub and have to sync everyone who has *ever* joined the pub.

#pub #scuttlebutt
